title: fc770923.AzFuSG.001
frontText: What term describes the reduction in cost of a cloud service as the number of subscribers increases?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.002
frontText: True or False: An Azure subscription serves as a logical container for Azure resources.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.003
frontText: Which Azure service would you use to create compliance reports for your organization?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.004
frontText: True or False: Microsoft requires you to provide personal information to use some of its products and services.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.005
frontText: __________________ is an isolated instance of Azure available to U.S. government agencies and providers that support them.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.006
frontText: What tool enables you to create a cost estimate for moving an entire data center to Azure, factoring in facilities, power, and other costs?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.007
frontText: Which Azure service offers URL path‐based routing for global deployments?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.008
frontText: True or False: A resource group serves a logical container for resources.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.009
frontText: Which database service is often used in LAMP‐based development?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.010
frontText: What object in Azure enables you to create declarative, JSON‐based templates to deploy Azure resources?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.011
frontText: Which Azure service enables just‐in‐time (JIT) access control for ports, enabling temporary access to a server or service in Azure?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.012
frontText: ______________________ is a group of policies in Azure.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.013
frontText: True or False: Azure Advisor provides information about planned maintenance in Azure.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.014
frontText: Which two services provide a collaborative development environment in Azure for open source projects?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.015
frontText: You want to move a service consisting of two Windows servers, an Azure server, and a database to Azure. What tool should you use to estimate the cost?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.016
frontText: True or False: Deploying additional instances of a VM to two or more availability zones can improve the SLA for those VMs.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.017
frontText: Which Azure service enables you to protect emails and documents using identity, encryption, and authorization policies?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.018
frontText: True or False: Azure Machine Learning Studio enables you to deploy machine learning models as web services.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.019
frontText: Which service enables you to create machine learning models using drag‐and‐drop in a web portal?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.020
frontText: True or False: An Azure blueprint takes effect as soon as you publish the blueprint.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.021
frontText: Which Azure service other than Azure Resource Manager enables you to publish resources in a controlled and repeatable way, including with change control?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.022
frontText: Which type of storage in Azure enables you to store and retrieve persistent data for container instances?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.023
frontText: An attack using multiple passwords against a single username is called _____________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.024
frontText: Which type of attack tests login to a fake account that you have created?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.025
frontText: True or False: An attack using an alphabetical list of usernames is an example of a reconnaissance attack.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.026
frontText: True or False: Azure China is available only to Chinese government entities.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.027
frontText: What Azure instance is licensed from Microsoft and managed by 21Vianet?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.028
frontText: True or False: You can easily move resources between Azure and Azure China.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.029
frontText: What is usually the easiest method for moving VMs between Azure regions?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.030
frontText: Adding or removing VMs to meet an increase in demand is called ___________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.031
frontText: What enables administrators to associate permissions with roles to control the actions that users can take in Azure?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.032
frontText: What are two PaaS solutions in Azure built around SQL Server that enable you to create and manage SQL databases without standing up servers or VMs?
backText: Azure SQL Database and SQL Managed Instance

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.033
frontText: Which NoSQL solution in Azure enables you to store and manage unstructured data?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.034
frontText: True or False: Deleting a blueprint causes all resources defined by the blueprint to be deleted.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.035
frontText: True or False: An Azure blueprint must be published and then assigned before it takes effect.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.036
frontText: _____________________ enables a development team to quickly and easily deploy VMs and other resources to test applications.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.037
frontText: Accessing an on‐premises resource such as website using your Azure AD account requires which edition of Azure Active Directory?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.038
frontText: What enables you to use your existing Windows Server and SQL Server license in Azure, as long as those licenses are covered by Software Assurance?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.039
frontText: What enables you to set a limit on the number of CPU cores, memory, and other resources in a resource group?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.040
frontText: True or False: ACI containers in a group all run the same operating system.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.041
frontText: True or False: Azure containers can run on either Windows or Linux.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.042
frontText: Which Azure service enables you to detect attacks in your Azure environment like pass‐the‐hash, pass‐the‐token, honeytoken, reconnaissance, and brute‐force attacks?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.043
frontText: You can use ___________________ for orchestration and management of container instances in Azure.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.044
frontText: Moving physical servers to VMs in Azure shifts costs from __________ expenditures to operational expenditures.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.045
frontText: Moving services to Azure will likely increase _______________ expenditures while decreasing capital expenditures.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.046
frontText: Which least‐privilege RBAC role provides the capability to manage management groups in Azure?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.047
frontText: True or False: Azure Bot Services enable you to perform natural language translation.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.048
frontText: What Azure service enables you to build virtual agents that can interact with users?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.049
frontText: True or False: You can use Azure Service Health to receive service alerts by email or text regarding information collected by Azure Monitor.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.050
frontText: You can use ____________________ to publish Azure alerts to a website using webhooks.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.051
frontText: True or False: Azure DDoS Protection Standard begins protecting resources against distributed denial‐of‐service (DDoS) attacks as soon as you create the resources.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.052
frontText: Which Azure service protects against volumetric, protocol, and resource layer denial‐of‐service attacks?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.053
frontText: Which service enables you to define budgets for your Azure subscriptions, set spending thresholds, and receive notifications when spending exceeds those thresholds?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.054
frontText: The Azure service that enables you to create, manage, and store certificates and other secrets is ________________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.055
frontText: True or False: You can use Azure Key Vault to store credentials used by applications in your environment.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.056
frontText: Which service connects your on‐premises data center to Azure using a secure, encrypted connection tunneled across the Internet?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.057
frontText: True or False: When you apply a policy to a resource group, the policy applies to all resources in the group.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.058
frontText: True or False: Azure Monitor begins monitoring an Azure resource as soon as you create the resource.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.059
frontText: All traffic going to server LQR191 needs to come from a single endpoint, regardless of where the network traffic originated. Which service would you use to accomplish this?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.060
frontText: NIST and ISO are examples of _______________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.061
frontText: True or False: GDRP is an example of a regulatory compliance regulation.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.062
frontText: What Azure service enables you to create serverless code where you pay for only the resources used during the time the code is running?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.063
frontText: Normally stateless, an Azure Function can be made stateful through the addition of ________________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.064
frontText: Which service in Azure enables you to use drag‐and‐drop to create serverless workflow solutions?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.065
frontText: True or False: You can integrate Functions and Logic Apps.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.066
frontText: True or False: Adding a subscription to Azure increases costs.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.067
frontText: True or False: Adding resource groups to Azure increases costs.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.068
frontText: Which Azure service provides security recommendations?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.069
frontText: Which service would you use to analyze a massive amount of data collected from thousands of IoT sensors deployed in your manufacturing facilities?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.070
frontText: What is Azure spot pricing?
backText: Spot pricing enables you to purchase VM resources at reduced rates using excess capacity, but the VMs can be evicted when availability decreases to a price point that you have set.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.071
frontText: True or False: All Azure regions have the same costs for the same services, providing consistency across all regions.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.072
frontText: ______________________ enables you to prepurchase Azure services at a significantly reduced rate.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.073
frontText: True or False: Azure China is a physically isolated instance of Azure owned and operated by the Chinese government.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.074
frontText: True or False: Azure China is available only to Chinese governmental agencies.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.075
frontText: You need to view status of Azure resources by region. Which service should you use?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.076
frontText: What is Azure Advisor?
backText: You use it to receive recommendations for managing and reducing operational costs, improving operational excellence, and enhancing security in Azure.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.077
frontText: True or False: An administrator with the appropriate permissions can delete a locked resource group without removing the lock.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.078
frontText: True or False: When locks are applied at different scopes, the most restrictive lock applies.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.079
frontText: True or False: You must remove the lock before you can modify or delete a locked resource.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.080
frontText: The ability to have additional compute resources added or removed automatically to adapt to changes in demand is called __________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.081
frontText: You provide your username and password on a website, the site sends you a code to your mobile device, which you then enter in the website to access the site. This is an example of _________________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.082
frontText: Is providing a username and password an example of authentication or authorization?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.083
frontText: You arrive at a foreign country and present your passport to identify yourself. You then provide a visa, which is a form of _____________.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.084
frontText: Which Azure service enables you to create serverless workflow solutions?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.085
frontText: You need to give a handful of users the ability to create resources in Azure. Which least‐privilege role should you use?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.086
frontText: True or False: Azure services in public preview are available to all Azure subscribers and are usually subject to different terms of service than generally available (GA) services.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.087
frontText: True or False: Private preview resources are available only by invitation from Microsoft.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.088
frontText: You need to roll out services with dependencies and ensure that they are deployed in the correct order. You use ________________ for this.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.089
frontText: The __________________ is a website that provides information about how Microsoft implements and supports compliance, security, privacy, and transparency across its cloud services.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.090
frontText: A ___________________ is a logical container for resources.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.091
frontText: Azure SQL Database, Azure Functions, and Azure Logic Apps are all examples of what cloud category?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.092
frontText: You need to ensure that the service provided by a group of VMs does not become unavailable due to a data center outage, so you create additional VMs and place them in _____________________ in the same region.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.093
frontText: True or False: Azure Data Lake Analytics enables you to query data stored in a data lake and build visualizations without deploying hardware or supporting services.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.094
frontText: To calculate a composite SLA of multiple Azure resources, you ________________.
backText: Multiply the SLAs of the individual resources.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.095
frontText: Which Azure service enables your users to run a Windows client session on a macOS device?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.096
frontText: What is the first thing you must do before you can add storage in Azure?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.097
frontText: True or False: Web Application Firewall protects a web application from common web‐based attacks.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.098
frontText: ________________________ enables you to create services that can scan and identify content in a photograph, perform natural language translation, and detect sentiment in text.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.099
frontText: Using Microsoft Office applications from the Microsoft 365 website is an example of which cloud category?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.100
frontText: What are Azure Artifacts?
backText: They are a component of Azure DevOps that provides a repository for storing development artifacts.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.101
frontText: True or False: Azure CLI is based on the Bash shell and is a good management resource for experienced Linux administrators.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.102
frontText: You want to purchase products and services from Microsoft using a three‐year agreement that includes licensing, support, and Azure services. What type of agreement does this describe?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.103
frontText: Which Azure service should you use to filter network traffic into three virtual networks that all have the same requirements?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.104
frontText: True or False: You can use a network security group to specify which Azure administrators can access the resources in a virtual network.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.105
frontText: What is the least expensive Azure Active Directory edition that enables users to reset their Azure AD passwords?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.106
frontText: What edition of Azure Active Directory enables single sign‐on capability between Azure and on‐premises services?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.107
frontText: True or False: Moving resources from one region to another could affect the costs of those resources.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.108
frontText: What type of Azure storage is the least expensive and most appropriate option for storage that is accessed very infrequently and can sometimes be slow to retrieve?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.109
frontText: You want to store massive amounts of data and visualize the data using Power BI. Which two services should you consider for this scenario?
backText: Azure Data Lake for storage and Azure Synapse Analytics for visualization in Power BI

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.110
frontText: True or False: IoT Central enables you to analyze telemetry coming from IoT devices.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.111
frontText: A hybrid cloud scenario is one in which services in Azure integrate with _____________________.
backText: Services in an on‐premises data center, third‐party data center, or other cloud providers’ services

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.112
frontText: True or False: Azure ExpressRoute Direct provides a VPN connection between your on‐premises data center and Azure across the Microsoft private network (not the Internet).

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.113
frontText: What Azure service enables you to store large amounts of data, query and transform the data using SQL, and build and test AI machine learning models based on that data?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.114
frontText: You need to deploy a single VM. Which management tool enables you to do that with the least effort without creating a script?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.115
frontText: Which Azure service gives you features similar to Azure SQL Database but also offers enhanced capabilities, including migration capabilities?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.116
frontText: You are considering moving many of IT workloads to Azure. What will provide you with guidance on best practices, tools, and assessments?
backText: The Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.117
frontText: You are trying to deploy a resource in Azure and receive an error indicating that the subscription limits have been reached. What action should you take to increase the subscription limits?
backText: Open a support case with Microsoft

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.118
frontText: You are having dinner in a restaurant and receive a text asking you to reset a web app. All you have is your mobile device. What do you do?
backText: Run the Azure CLI from the Azure Mobile App installed on your mobile device.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.119
frontText: True or False: IoT Hub provides bidirectional communications between Azure and IoT devices.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.120
frontText: You need to send all HTTPS traffic within a region to a specific endpoint within that same region. Which service that supports URL path‐based routing should you use?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.121
frontText: Virtual machines (VMs) in Azure are an example of what cloud category?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.122
frontText: True or False: An Azure region is usually paired with another region to help ensure high availability.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.123
frontText: True or False: An Azure region corresponds to a specific data center.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.124
frontText: An Azure geography contains one or more regions and often corresponds to a country or _____________________.
backText: a discrete market containing multiple countries, such as Europe

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.125
frontText: How much notice must Microsoft provide before retiring an Azure service?

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.126
frontText: True or False: You can run the Azure CLI from PowerShell on a Windows 10 device.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.127
frontText: You can use ___________________________ to train and validate AI models.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.128
frontText: What does a content delivery network (CDN) do?
backText: It enables you to place content such as documents and videos in multiple locations geographically close to users, reducing latency.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.129
frontText: What is the first step before you can deploy any resources to Azure?
backText: You must create an Azure subscription.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.130
frontText: True or False: Azure Firewall enables you to filter network traffic based on source IP address and port, destination address and port, and protocol.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.131
frontText: True or False: Moving IT services and resources from an on‐premises data center to a consumption‐based service such as Azure enables you to replace capital expenditures with operational expenditures.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.132
frontText: True or False: One benefit of moving to Azure is that Microsoft manages all the resources in Azure for you, enabling you to potentially reduce staffing costs.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.133
frontText: Compliance in Azure is a ____________ between your organization and Microsoft.

title: fc770923.AzFuSG.134
frontText: Agility refers to the ability to ______________________.
backText: Adjust resources to meet changes in demand.
